Welcome to Clock-Tab, the ultimate new tab experience designed to transform your browsing moments into a blend of style, utility, and privacy. Our clock-themed new tab is your canvas, ready to be tailored to your tastes, all while keeping your data secure.

Key Features:

üï∞Ô∏è Fully Customizable Clock Theme: Make your new tab uniquely yours. Choose from a variety of clock styles and layouts, allowing you to create a browsing environment that matches your personality and preferences.

‚òÄÔ∏è Local Weather Updates: Stay informed about the weather conditions in your city with a quick visit to the settings menu at the lower left corner of your new tab. Be prepared for the day ahead with real-time weather information.

üîí Privacy Assurance: Your data is yours and yours alone. Clock-Tab is committed to your privacy. We do not collect any of your data, ensuring a secure and private browsing experience.

How Clock-Tab Works:

Download and Install: Get Clock-Tab extension from the Chrome Store and install it.

Customize Your Clock: Change colors and size as you need with selecting time-second type.

Set Your City for Weather: In the settings , choose your city for accurate weather updates. (We don't fetch your location data)

Enjoy Your Personalized New Tab: Start each browsing session with a beautifully customized clock and stay up-to-date with local weather conditions.

Download Clock-Tab now and embrace a new era of browsing!
